title: Expander Parameters
description: Factors that control the behavior of a Java class that appends related objects when examining a data object before the object is shared

includeDefinitionalItems.comments: When true, add data objects that are part of the starting object's definition
includeDefinitionalItems.title: Include definitional objects

definitionalGenerations.comments: number of generations to go back
definitionalGenerations.title: Number of generations of objects to include

includedRelatedItems.comments: When true, add items at the other end of inter-object relationships
includedRelatedItems.title: Include related objects

relatedGenerations.comments: Number of generations of relationships to include
relatedGenerations.title: Number of generations of relationships to include

includeModifyingItems.comments: When true, add items that are part of 'modifications' of the starting item.  This is based on Substance AgentModifications
includeModifyingItems.title: Include modification items

includeMediatingItems.comments: When true, add items that are used in the definitions of amounts
includeMediatingItems.title: Include objects mentioned in amounts
